text: We will hear arguments next in 5706, Proffitt against Florida.
Mr. Chief Justice Burger, just one or two comments --
I have a question before you start, the growing rate of homicides in Florida at the present time, how many thousands a year or hundred?
There is hardly a large city in America including Washington that does not have more homicides every year than all the European Countries this side of the Iron Curtain.
Mr. Chief Justice, if you say it, I will accept that as so.
